text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.title: Realistic Sleep Config
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.se: Send a message to all players at dawn.
Send a message to all players at dusk.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.da: The message displayed to all players at dawn.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.du: The message displayed to all players at dawn.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.se: Toggles the "players are sleeping through this night..." message.
Send not enough players sleeping message?
Toggles the amount of players who need to sleep to skip to dawn message.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.sl: The curve used to determine the speed multiplier of the night as time progresses.
How many times faster the night should go.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.bl: How many times faster block entities like furnaces should tick.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.ch: How many times faster chunks should tick. Enable at your own risk. Insane TPS loss is guaranteed!!!!!
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.ra: How many times faster raid timers should tick .
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.en: How many times faster entities should tick.
text.autoconfig.realisticsleep.option.ti: Adds an amount of ticks delay to every tick, so time goes slower.
realisticsleep.text.not_enough_players_s: %d/%d players are currently sleeping. %d/%d players are required to sleep through the %s
